page.title: 04A COMMUNITY PROJECT
page.content: A piece of land has been given to the local community in{Cotmanhay}by the {Erewash Borough Council.}Local people are clearing the land so that they can build a{B.M.X.track}and{two adventure {playgrounds.}Later a{nature reserve} will be developed around a pond. Trees, bushes and shrubs will be planted and the area will hopefully attract a variety of wildlife. There will also be a{picnic area} on the site. {Local schools}are helping to plan the project and later children will help to build it. The total cost of the project will be {Â£19,000.}The money is being raised by the organisers through different fund raising activities. It is hoped that the first part of the project will be completed by the end of 1985.
